content: s weetcorn knitting pattern by amanda berry email fluffandfuzz@googlemail com * website fluffandfuzz@weebly com yarn sirdar hayfield bonus dk 100% acrylic dk weight yarn double knitting or light worsted weight less than 25g in each colour yellow shade bright lemon green shade grass gauge 6 sts x 8 row per 2 5cm square needles & notions a pair of straight 2 75mm us 2 knitting needles minimum length 20cm a tapestry needle for seaming a few handfuls of toy filling two 9mm toy safety eyes a stitch holder size one size - the sweetcorn is 18cm tall the texture of the this pattern is for personal use only sweetcorn is created by knitting in not for resale hurdle stitch a simple combination of copyright © 2020 amanda berry all patterns designed by amanda berry are protected by international knit and purl stitches copyright laws any unauthorised copying sharing or reselling will constitute an infringement of copyright all rights reserved sweetcorn page 1 of 3 copyright © 2020 amanda berry key knitting pattern inc2 knit into the front back and front corn cob again a double increase make 1 k knit cast on 17 sts in yellow yarn on straight 2 75mm kfb knit into the front and back increase needles k2tog knit two stitches together decrease start at the base p purl row 1 rs knit psso pass the slipped stitch over decrease row 2 ws k1 kfb 14 times k2 31 sts rs right side row 3 k1 p1 to the last stitch k1 slip1 slip one stitch purl-wise row 4 p1 k1 to the last stitch p1 ssk slip the next stitch knit-wise then row 5 knit slip the next stitch purl-wise then row 6 k1 inc2 k9 3 times 37 sts knit through the front of the two slipped sts to decrease row 7 k1 p1 to the last stitch k1 st s stitch es row 8 p1 k1 to the last stitch p1 ws wrong side row 9 knit row 10 k11 inc2 2 times k13 41 sts row 11 k1 p1 to the last stitch k1 row 12 p1 k1 to the last stitch p1 notes row 13 and 14 knit casting on row 15 to 50 repeat row 11 to 14 nine more times on row 22 mark the 18th and 23rd stitches use the cable cast and leave a 30cm yarn tail for as a guide for inserting the eyes making up row 51 k1 p1 to the last stitch k1 pull through to cast off row 52 p1 k1 to the last stitch p1 break the yarn leaving a 30cm tail thread the tail onto a tapestry needle and thread through the row 53 knit stitches on the knitting needle pulling them off row 54 k1 slip1 k2tog psso k17 2 times the needle and onto the yarn and pull tight to 37 sts gather the stitches together row 55 k1 p1 to the last stitch k1 marking stitches row 56 p1
